attributes.text: This class defines all the building blocks for a Visu in the “Pure” design
Return the inner DOM string for this widget
Called when all widgets are available in the DOM tree
Default action for tap events, does nothing but can be overridden by subclasses
Add a listener to the widgets interaction element
Default action for pointerdown events, does nothing but can be overridden by subclasses

Returns the (computed) value of the property align.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #align}.

Returns the (computed) value of the property flavour.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #flavour}.
Return the element which should be used to attach listeners too. Unsually this would be the actor but if bindClickToWidget is true it would be the DomElement (aka widget-container)

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property align with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #align}.
